name: Need for vaz 2106
description:
The magnificent behavior of the car thanks to realistic physics, an insane influx of adrenaline, and the ability to drive with jewelry precision are all Need for Vaz Will you be able to stay on the highway and not fall into the icy water? This is a game about the legendary "Six" (Vaz 2106).

 - You will have the opportunity to ride 5 differently configured cars. 

- A choice of 3 camera angles for viewing.

 - Beautiful landscapes. 

- switchable soundtrack 

- The ability to turn on the headlights
